minimalist.longDescription: A pristine, distraction-free design that puts your content first. Perfect for professionals who value clarity and elegance. Clean lines, ample whitespace, and thoughtful typography create a sophisticated presence that lets your work speak for itself.

service-marketplace.longDescription: A comprehensive marketplace platform designed for service providers. Features advanced filtering, booking systems, and user reviews. Perfect for building multi-vendor service platforms, appointment booking sites, or professional directories with integrated payment processing.

dark-mode.longDescription: Designed specifically for dark mode enthusiasts. Deep blacks, carefully calibrated contrasts, and eye-friendly color palettes. Perfect for developers, tech companies, and modern brands who want to stand out with a sleek, contemporary aesthetic.

ru: Дизайн с уменьшенной нагрузкой на глаза

bold-typography.longDescription: Make a statement with oversized headlines and powerful typography. Perfect for brands that need to capture attention instantly. Features custom font pairings, kinetic text animations, and bold visual hierarchy that commands attention.

fullscreen-immersive.longDescription: Transform your portfolio into an immersive visual experience. Full-screen sections with parallax scrolling, video backgrounds, and cinematic transitions create an unforgettable journey through your work. Ideal for photographers, videographers, and visual artists.

startup-pitch.longDescription: Built for startups that need to make a powerful first impression. Optimized for conversions with strategic CTAs, social proof sections, and investor-ready layouts. Perfect for SaaS products, tech startups, and fundraising campaigns.

bento-grid.longDescription: Modern modular design inspired by Japanese bento boxes. Asymmetric grid layouts that create visual interest while maintaining perfect organization. Ideal for showcasing multiple services, products, or portfolio pieces with equal emphasis.

3d-immersive.longDescription: Push the boundaries of web design with Three.js 3D elements, WebGL effects, and interactive 3D models. Perfect for tech companies, game studios, and brands wanting to create truly memorable digital experiences that wow visitors.

neo-brutalist.longDescription: Raw, unapologetic design that breaks all the rules. Bold borders, clashing colors, and intentionally rough aesthetics. Perfect for brands that want to stand out and aren't afraid to be different. Inspired by brutalist architecture and punk design movements.

glassmorphism-modern.longDescription: Cutting-edge frosted glass effects with backdrop blur, transparency, and depth. Modern, elegant design that feels premium and futuristic. Perfect for fintech, SaaS products, and brands that want a sophisticated, iOS-inspired aesthetic.

blog-personal.longDescription: A warm, readable blog design focused on your writing. Beautiful typography, comfortable reading experience, and personal touches that help readers connect with your voice. Perfect for authors, journalists, and storytellers.

blog-magazine.longDescription: Editorial-style design inspired by premium magazines. Multi-column layouts, featured articles, and sophisticated typography create a professional publication feel. Perfect for news sites, online magazines, and content-heavy platforms.

professional-b2b.longDescription: Corporate design built for B2B sales. Trust-building elements, case studies, and ROI-focused content structure. Perfect for enterprise software, professional services, and companies selling to other businesses.

product-saas.longDescription: Conversion-optimized design for SaaS products. Features benefit-focused sections, pricing tables, and strategic CTAs. Includes trial signup flows and product demo sections. Perfect for subscription-based software products.

creative-agency-bold.longDescription: Make a bold statement with this energetic agency template. Vibrant colors, dynamic animations, and portfolio showcases that demand attention. Perfect for design agencies, marketing firms, and creative studios that want to show off their personality.

minimal-portfolio-clean.longDescription: Elegant portfolio design that lets your work take center stage. Clean layouts, subtle animations, and thoughtful spacing create a sophisticated showcase. Perfect for designers, illustrators, and creatives who want their work to speak louder than the design.

grid-masonry.longDescription: Professional Grid Masonry template with modern design and powerful features. Perfect for creating engaging, conversion-optimized experiences that stand out.
